intro: Yinshania acutangula, commonly known as the sharp-angled yinshania, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, opposite leaves with a serrated edge. Its flowers are typically white or pale yellow, clustered in dense inflorescences. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
